prompt: Create a dark and vibrant fantasy art depicting a gigantic, serpentine creature emerging gracefully from the misty waters of an enchanted swamp. The Eldritch Serpent has glowing eyes and bioluminescent scales that cast an eerie light onto the surrounding ancient trees and glowing plants. Its body is adorned with mystical symbols that shimmer with a magical glow. The background shows a dense, mist-shrouded swamp with twisted, ancient trees and hidden secrets lurking beneath the murky waters, adding to the mysterious, awe-inspiring atmosphere.
